testimonials.text: Shivangi is a hard working and passionate to work kind of person. She loves the work she does and while doing it she does it with her full abilities.

Shivangi is one of the most passionate developers I've  met! It was amazing working with her. Hey you, you should hire this girl, She may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that She will be one of your best developers in no time!
